amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 116-457 to require that any Federal law enforcement officer deployed pursuant to 10 U.S.C. 253 be clearly identified by name and agency visible on their uniform or other clothing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 116-457 to require that any Federal law enforcement officer deployed pursuant to 10 U.S.C. 253 be clearly identified by name and agency visible on their uniform or other clothing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A013) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Houlahan.
